about.title: About Me
about.p1: FullStack Developer focused on modern and scalable web solutions. Passionate about technology, innovation and continuous learning, with growing experience in Artificial Intelligence and automation with n8n.
about.p2: I always seek to combine creativity and logic to deliver efficient solutions, focusing on AI, web and mobile. I value teamwork, clear communication and the positive impact of technology on society.
about.p3: Advanced English — advanced communication, reading and writing, near fluency.

footer.made: Built with React, Tailwind and a love for code.
